trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around July 4th 2011
divs: sighting detailswas at a party for july 4,2011 in kc,ks shooting fireworks when i observed a large glowing reddish orange light approx. 500 ft high approaching in a straight line and then stop and disappear. approx. 2 min.passed and 3 reddish glowing lights appeared at the same location and formed a pattern of two on the left and 1 on the right in close proximity as if it was 3 lights on 1 craft. the lights tilted sideways and separated into a very large triangular shape. it then moved off behind houses and trees. i ran to observe it and it was gone. this craft is the same as many have described of large triangular craft with reddish-orange lights. it was distinctly different from the fireworks. i was the only observer. thank you, [name and email removed\cms\tg]
Summary: July 4,2011 approx.10 p.m. witnessed 3 glowing lights reddish-orange in triangular shape.
